00085         //
00086     // Contract :
00087     //
00088         {
00089                 $exectime = new Template();
00090                 $exectime->SetMaquette ( round( microtime(true) - $applicationVars[ Application::SYSTEM_START_TIME ], 4 ) );
00091 
00092                 $this->pageTemplate->GetBody()->SetTag( self::TAG_EXECUTION_TIME, $exectime );
00093                         
00094                 echo $this->pageTemplate;
00095         } //---- End of OnUnLoad
